name: Aesthedeck
description:
Welcome to Aesthedeck, a game created for the Brackeys Game Jame 2018!

You take on the role of a lone survivor defending her deck from the incoming Monster Invasion!

A and D or Left and Right Arrows will move you from lane to lane

The Space Bar or Left Click will let you shoot your gun

You can press R to manually reload your gun at any time.

Experience 3 difficulty settings for varying lane options!

Have fun and try to get the high score! 

NEW IN UPDATE 0.2

- Fixed bug that caused players to spawn with 0 ammo and 0 reload speed
